name: Waka Ball
description:
Set in a distant future  on a far off planet. Man created alien cyborgs, living creatures with mechanical components incorporated into their bodies.

Was this something that was asked for....NO. Was this something that was needed... No. Were these creations useful to anyone... No. What did man end up using them for I hear you ask? Well... sport!

Play as one of the cyborgs in this 1 v 1 rocket league inspired multiplayer game. Using  power ups like speed boost and decoys to out play your opponent. get the ball in the goal more times then the other player to win.

This is a local multiplayer game for 2 players. Players can use controllers or share the keyboard.
